desc: This book constitutes the refereed proceedings of the 8th International Conference of the CLEF Initiative, CLEF 2017, held in Dublin, Ireland, in September 2017.

details.authors: Gareth J.F. Jones (Editor),‎ Séamus Lawless (Editor),‎ Julio Gonzalo (Editor),‎ Liadh Kelly (Editor),‎ Lorraine Goeuriot (Editor),‎ Thomas Mandl (Editor),‎ Linda Cappellato (Editor),‎ Nicola Ferro (Editor)

title: Experimental IR Meets Multilinguality, Multimodality, and Interaction: 8th International Conference of the CLEF Association, CLEF 2017
